go_data.justification: ACTA2 is expressed in HAFs and its expression is increased in response to Ang-II treatment, which is related to atrial fibrosis.
ACTA2 is an actin protein that is a component of the cytoskeleton.
ACTA2 expression is increased in HAFs in response to miR-23b-3p and miR-27b-3p, which promote atrial fibrosis.
